Name: Bistrot des Alpes

Review Text: The Bistrot Des Alpes is an amazing excellent restaurant to eat food from the French Alps. I have tried the tartiflette and it was amazing, really better than some I was able to eat in the French Alps. ‚Ä¶

We ordered the Raclette and it was more than enough for 2 people, the charcuterie was really good too. I think the prices are fair considering Amsterdam. Definetly worth the visit

Review Text: Amazing place. Great food and service. The lovely staff ran after me for 3 minutes as i left my (favourite) hat. Excellent!!

Review Text: Absolutely delicious food! The Raclette cheese was so good. The service was great too. Will definitely come back!

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Amazing food, wonderful service and cozy atmosphere! Meat and fish were delicious, but what blew us away was the details and taste on how vegetables were prepared.

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: totally brings mountain chalet feeling! perfect for rainy Amsterdam winter season but also great in summer with outdoor seating. top food - raclette or any other cheese-based dishes are exquisite but this place has much more to offer. make sure to book upfront as most evenings it is full.

Review Text: Propably the best fondue north of the alps in an authentic and cozy setting

Review Text: Service is great, food is excellent, I definitely recommend this lovely restaurant!!!!

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Wonderful restaurant. My wife and I both had the parmesan tart appetizer, which was beautifully presented and featured fresh vegetables on crispy parmesan. The trout on a bed of pea cream and quinoa was to die for. Will definitely go back someday.

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Good restaurant with typical French meals. And the decoration, we feel like in mountain ! And the staff is really attentive and nice. Reservation recommended !

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Wish we found this fabulous restaurant earlier. Service was awesome as well as the food. I believe we may have licked our dishes clean! Thank you for a memorable last night in Amsterdam!!

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: The best French food in Amsterdam without a doubt. Deliciously authentic -you can tell they are using high quality ingredients from the region. When we read the menu we wondered if the food would live up to our expectations & it surpassed ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Not my best picture, but what a great experience. The meal started with a flavorful amuse-bouche. We shared a fondue and raclette with an amazing charcuterie. I loved the warm and cozy ski chalet decor making us feel there was a snow covered mountain right outside.

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Who doesn't love cheese? I'll go there even in summer. Delicious food, super nice staff and atmosphere cosy and not too warm. Everyhtgvting is good so treat yourself!

Review Text: Really nice experience! 5 out of 5 ‚ù§Ô∏è the most favorite is tuna starter and lamb!

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Great restaurant and service. Only 4 stars and not 5 because I expected the menu to have something a little more innovative, it is very traditional food which is very appreciated of course but a little innovation would not hurt!

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Amazing food and service. One of the best fondues I've had. Quickly became one of my favourite restaurants in Amsterdam!

Name: Bistrot des Alpes
Review Text: Amazing experience in this french restaurant that is decorated as a ski-cabin. Staff is really friendly and efficient and the food is superb. Try the cheese fondue or the raclette, both are amazing! Also leave some room for the dessert as they also excel in that area.

Name: Bistrot des Alpes

Review Text: I had to edit my review to accommodate the covid times. Bistro des Alpes is amazing, and the quality of the food will never disappoint.
